channel.title: Comments for page "Substitute Soul Reaper Badge"
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Substitute Soul Reaper Badge"

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: Though with the updated item pic, the Hello My Name is Reaper thing is gone :P Probably so people would stop arguing over the source of the ref.

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: Kurosaki Ichigo has an actual Substitute Soul Reaper Badge though (which nobody in the show recognizes! :D). I'd guess the name is a Bleach reference and the item pic a Reaper one.

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded:
lol I have seen that show. If I had seen the pic I would have noticed.

Thx for the look outâ€¦.. Anonymous. XD

edit: Ok, I fixed the trivia however the link for the REAPER show will not work. It looks the url is too long or something. Someone fix it if they can.

item.title: Badge?!? NO!
item.content:encoded: OK so you all think this is from bleach wrong it's really from a tv show called REAPER and in the ending of the intro it says "Hello My Name is Reaper" so if you can fix that thanks!
